title: Climate tech steps into the spotlight at TC Sessions: Climate 2022 - TechCrunch
content: Climate tech steps into the spotlight at TC Sessions: Climate 2022  TechCrunch
description: It’s going to take a whole lot more than electric cars and plant-based foods to change the course of climate change, the most critical, existential crisis in human history. Climate tech isn’t just one industry: it’s every industry in every country across the globe. And it’s why we’re launching our …
